txt.en: 'So the first was smooth, the second flavourful, and the third you couldn't quite handle? Sounds like we are ready for the market then!'
Sample the Pipe-weed
Took a sample from the first bag
'Take a sample from the first bag.'
The fresh pipe-weed has a soft smooth taste
'Use the pipe I gave you to sample the first bag of pipe-weed.'
Took a sample from the second bag
The first bag of pipe-weed is on the table.\n\nYou should get some pipe-weed from the first bag.
'Take a pinch from the second bag, it's a half-and-half blend.'
This one is still smooth, but the taste is deep and lingers
You should use the pipe you were given to sample the pipe-weed.
'This should be a little more bitter than the first, but have more flavour.'
Took a sample from the third bag of pipe-weed
The second bag of pipe-weed is on the table.\n\nYou should get some pipe-weed from the second bag.
'The third bag is all dried for a season; it might be too strong for those not used to it.'
Your lungs burn at the harsh, thick flavour
Use the pipe you were given to sample the second pouch of pipe-weed.
'Don't be ashamed if you cough a little.'
The third pouch is on the counter.\n\nYou should take a sample of pipe-weed from the third pipe-weed pouch.
Use the pipe to sample the third pipe-weed blend.
Blossom Gamgee is at the Pipe-weed House on the Northcotton Farm.\n\nBlossom Gamgee will want to know what you thought of the pipe-weed blends.
Take a sample from the first bag
Use the pipe to sample the first bag of pipe-weed
Take a sample from the second bag
Use the pipe to sample the second pipe-weed blend
Take a sample from the third bag of pipe-weed
Sample the third pipe-weed blend
Return the pipe to Blossom Gamgee
Pipe-weed is something hobbits take very seriously. A market would never be visited unless it had a suitable supply and variety.

'Now for the best part. You cannot put a product out without a thorough testing and sampling. You have to make sure that what you're selling is only the best.

'I've put together three blends on the table there. One that is all freshly-picked pipe-weed, one that is all dried pipe-weed, and one that is a half-and-half blend.

'Take this pipe and sample the blends. If you think they are good, then I will agree that they should be sold at the market.'
